ingredients.name: Columbian
ingredients.description: A strong caramel sweetness,  with a nutty undertone. Perfect for everyday.

ingredients.name: Earl Grey
ingredients.description: Earl Grey Tea is a fine black tea  blended with citrus. A unique floral aroma and refreshing taste.

ingredients.name: Almondmilk
ingredients.description: A nutty flavor and creamy texture.

ingredients.name: Lemon Zinger
ingredients.description: Real lemons and lemongrass with hibiscus. A bright tea that's perfect in any weather.

ingredients.name: Ginger
ingredients.description: Add a slightly peppery and tangy flavor.

ingredients.name: Green Tea
ingredients.description: A refreshing way to start your day with young green tea leaves.

ingredients.name: Chamomile Tea
ingredients.description: Has a gentle flavour that even from the very first sip it feels wonderfully soothing.

ingredients.name: Peppermint tea
ingredients.description: A light, refreshing, minty and mildly sweet taste, leaving a cooling sensation in the mouth.

ingredients.name: Oolong Tea
ingredients.description: A stong distinct flavor, leaving a thick mouthfeel sensation

ingredients.name: Black Cherry Berry
ingredients.description: The perfect way to spoil yourself and unwind and relax after a long day.

ingredients.name: Herbal Tension Tamer Tea
ingredients.description: The finest herbs to release the tension within you.

ingredients.name: Herbal Sleepytime Tea
ingredients.description: A herbal blend to aid with sleeping. Great for children as well.
